front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Guide for the Application of Rogowski Coils Used for Protective Relaying Purposes

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document describes and provides guidance for the use and application of Rogowski coils (RCs) (air-core current sensors) for protective relaying in electric power systems. The selection and application of RCs for the more common protection schemes are also addressed.
